messages.message: Hi, could someone please help me to delete the folder in this directory (https://www.instabase.com/SA_team/demo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/UK%20KYC/workflows/) called `..` ?  I don’t know how this got created, when you try to make a folder called this, it doesn’t get created. A fun side effect of deleting this directory is that the directory 2 levels up gets deleted instead. If you try to open it you get an error, and just by being there it prevents the SDLC function working. So i’m a bit stuck what to do with it.
sounds like a file service bug @Nidhi @achao? probably shouldn’t folks create `.`/`..` folder names?
the empty string was also a valid folder name for a long time (it may still be?). i opened a ticket about it a while ago i think.
Hey @Chetan, yeah - we will be adding some validation to prevent files/folders with such names from being created.
So it doesn’t seem to let me create them now, it just fails silently.
@Lee I think I will have to go into S3 to delete this folder for you. I'll try to do get it done today!

Hi @Lee! I'm taking a look at the ".." directory in the S3 console, and looks like it contains a KYC Flow.ibflowbin that was last updated earlier today. Is there a flow you are running in that directory? I wonder if it is being created by that.
